job_description:
Our client, a global provider of Digital Transformation and Digital Engineering Services helping companies to transform in the digital economy . We are hiring for Senior Sales professionals - in East and Midwest regions to drive business development efforts.

Qualifications :
• Experience in Acquiring New logos / Clients preferable in IT Services, Outsourced IT/Product Engineering Services firm
• Strategic thinker capable of driving a partnership from concept to execution.
• Passionate about transformation in the digital economy
• Strong sense of technology innovation & collaboration
• Results-oriented with a sense of urgency and passion for success.
• Strong planning, project and organizational skills
• Outstanding communication, time management, presentation and organizational skills.

Responsibilties:
• Strategic business development efforts to solve business objectives that will enable them to compete in the digital economy.
• Services portfolio includes Product Engineering, Digital transformation, and ADM
• Collaborate with management executives, delivery and solutions teams to support the structuring, negotiating and closing of new strategic partnerships.
• Develop and manage business development plans and forecasts
• Plan and manage contracts, support marketing concepts, and go-to-market plans with internal executives and operational teams.
• Oversee and lead financial analysis and due diligence reviews of new strategic opportunities and coordinate their review and structure.
• Align with client executives on key initiatives and collaborate closely on execution.
• Detail business requirements, build proposals, and collaborate with internal and external client teams to ensure clear and realistic deliverables.
• Sustain, manage and cultivate relationships with new clients to foster deeper and new value creation to align with their business objectives
